name: Piece Of Home
description:
Going through childhood has always been quick and muddled, each memory seemingly a haze. Join Alex as she revisits her childhood through the eyes of her estranged grandparent. Solve puzzles left behind by her tinkering grandfather and unlock pieces of her past, uncovering an unlikely secret along the way.

A game built in 3 months as a capstone/thesis project. Featured lots of firsts for us as a team, and now we're sharing our labor of love to the world.
